name: The Alien that Moo'd
description:
A lonely depressed Alien travelling through the cosmos receives an emergency signal from planet Earth. Following the signal it finds terrified cows up for the slaughter in a Live Stock farm that it must save.  Can the player save the cows and form an everlasting friendship?

To move the player use the arrow keys or the WASD keys, to collect a cow you must fly over them. If the farmer hits you with a bullet you will lose one of your three life's. you will be able to collect two power ups one will give you a small speed boost and the other restoring one of your life's.

Requirement: Basic PC and keyboard.

ps: comic strips were not completed, so were cut :( .
